body:
I was particularly miffed at missing the Workshop this year -- so I'm particularly keen to see the presentations online. And, hopefully, material from the Advanced Fenestration course also.

Any ideas when?

-John

subject: [Radiance-general] 2010 Workshop presentations, soon?
